import React from "react"; import leftImg from "../img/item-4.png"; import item1 from "../img/item-1.png"; import item2 from "../img/item-2.png"; import item3 from "../img/item-9.png"; class Details extends React.Component { state = { productsNum: 0, products: [], }; increasePro() { this.state.productsNum++; } render() { const { description, name, price } = this.props.products[1]; return ( <>
